artist: Mill: N/E; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Black warp. Weft of all other colors forming a striped pattern. The random width block threading and the mixed textured yarns and mixed metallics in the shuttles gave desired variation in texture and color."Fashion Fabrics E48" written on card face.
